query.value:
SELECT 
Lead_18chr_Id__c,
MQL_Datestamp__c,
MTL_Datestamp__c,
SQL_Datestamp__c,
Status,
Company,
Lead_Country__c,
Title,
FirstName,
LastName,
Email,
MQL_Program__c,
Qualified_Out_Reason__c,
Status_Reason__c,
Sales_Region__c,
Sub_Region__c,
ConvertedAccountId,
ConvertedContactId,
CreatedDate,
OwnerID,
ConvertedOpportunityId,
LastModifiedDate

FROM Lead
where 
MQL_Datestamp__c!= null or
MTL_Datestamp__c!= null

where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select max(cast (Lastmodifieddate AS datetime)) AS Modified
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Lead]

select max(cast (createddate AS datetime))  AS Created
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Lead]

SELECT
Opportunity_18chr_Id__c,
Name,
Opportunity_Number__c,
AccountId,
Sales_Region_FY07__c,
Status__c,
StageName,
Probability,
Date_opportunity_moved_to_SS2__c,
Date_opportunity_moved_to_SS4__c,
ILF_CommValue_CSH__c,
ACV_ACV_Equiv_CSH__c,
IST_Rep,
CreatedDate,
LastModifiedDate
FROM Opportunity

where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

from Campaign

query.value:
select 
Id, IsoCode, ConversionRate, StartDate, NextStartDate,lastmodifieddate,CreatedDate
from datedconversionrate
where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z
